item.description:
I run a movie night twice a month with 2 other groups.

first i started off as a member and suggested some events,  then became an Event orgnizer.

 right now I scheduled a movie on 12.23.11 @ 6 pm

 Movie : Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol(2011) Action |

Adventure | Thriller - 21 December 2011 (USA)

The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

 

Director: Brad Bird Writers: Josh Appelbaum, André Nemec, and 1 more credit » Stars: Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner and Paula Patton
item.name: Mission Impossible 2011
